app.add-photo-error: Sorry, it looks like something went wrong. Please try again.
app.add-photo-instruction: The image will be added to the end of the section
app.add-photo-success: A photo has been added to the page.
app.article-empty-label: Desculpe, este artigo parece estar vazio!
app.article-error: Sorry, we couldn't load the article. Please try again.
app.article-redirect-empty-target: The link you followed is a redirect, but the page it directs to does not exist.
app.category-page-no-members: This category currently contains no pages.
app.curated-content-editor-add-items-message: Please add items to this section.
app.curated-content-editor-block-help-text: Move each item into the order you prefer. Tap on the arrows next to the item to change the order.
app.curated-content-editor-community-data-de: Add image and a summary to let visitors know what this wikia is all about and encourage them to visit. We'll use this information to promote your wiki in search results, Wikia mobile apps, and more.
app.curated-content-editor-empty-section-err: Sections can't be empty. Please add items to this section.
app.curated-content-editor-enter-category-na: When entering a category name in Curated Content use the same format you would use to link to a piece of content on Wikia (e.g. Category:Name_of_category).
app.curated-content-editor-enter-display-nam: This is the text that will appear on the main page for this item.
app.curated-content-editor-enter-page-name-t: When entering a page name in Curated Content use the same format you would use to link to a piece of content on Wikia (e.g. Name_of_article).
app.curated-content-editor-error-no-access-p: You don't have permissions to access this page
app.curated-content-editor-error-no-save-per: You don't have permissions to save data
app.curated-content-editor-exit-prompt: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to exit?
app.curated-content-editor-featured-categori: Featured Categories allow your users to explore your community at a high level through the use of Mediawiki categories. Categories should be grouped together into logical sections such as “Films” or “Comics”. If a category doesn’t work as part of a group we suggest placing it in the Optional Categories section below.
app.curated-content-editor-featured-descript: Featured Content can be used to highlight a specific piece of content on your community such as an article, video, or blog post. Ideally this content is timely and relevant to your readers and should be updated frequently.
app.curated-content-editor-general-section-e: Please fix errors in this section.
app.curated-content-editor-label-in-use-erro: This display name is already in use
app.curated-content-editor-only-categories-s: Only categories are supported in this section
app.curated-content-editor-optional-descript: For all categories that don’t make sense grouped with other categories you can place them in the Optional Categories section.
app.curated-content-editor-remove-item-confi: Are you sure you want to delete this item?
app.curated-content-editor-search-image-labe: Search for an image on wikia
app.curated-content-editor-unsupported-page-: This page type is not supported
app.curated-content-editor-video-provider-no: This video provider is not supported
app.curated-content-editor-wikia-description: Add a summary that will promote your wikia in search results and in other promotional areas.
app.curated-content-error-load-more-items: Sorry, we couldn't load more items.
app.curated-content-error-other: Sorry, it looks like something went wrong. Please try again.
app.curated-content-image-upload-error: Something went wrong with your upload. Please try again.
app.edit-load-error: Sorry, it looks like something went wrong. Please try again.
app.edit-publish-error: Sorry, it looks like something went wrong. Please try again.
app.edit-publish-error-autoblockedtext: Your IP address has been blocked automatically, because it was used by a blocked user.
app.edit-publish-error-blocked: You have been blocked from editing.
app.edit-publish-error-noedit: You don't have permission to edit pages on this wikia.
app.edit-publish-error-protectedpage: You don't have permission to edit this page.
app.image-review-error-invalid-data: Invalid data was returned from Image Review API
app.page-not-found-error: Desculpe, mas não conseguimos encontrar a página que você está procurando.
app.wiki-page-error: Sorry, we couldn't load the page. Please try again.
